name: checkout-customer-account-payment
description: This module allows the user to pay with their customer account at checkout

addPaymentButtonLabel.comment: The label that is displayed on the button to pay with customer account

inputAmountLabel.comment: The label that is displayed above the input for the user to choose the amount to pay with customer account

inputAmountSummaryLabel.comment: The label that is displayed above the input for the user to choose the amount to pay with customer account when in summary mode

inputAmountAriaLabel.comment: The aria label for accessability for the input for the user to choose the amount to pay with customer account
inputAmountAriaLabel.value: amount to pay with customer account

customerSinceLabel.comment: The label for the date the customer has been a customer since

accountCreditLabel.comment: The label for the account credit

invalidAmountMessage.comment: Message to be displayed when the amount is not valid.

creditDetailsSectionLabel.comment: The label for the credit details section

availableCreditLabel.comment: The label for the total available credit line

orderTotalLabel.comment: The label for the current total

creditExcessLabel.comment: The label for the excess that cannot be covered by credit

appliedCustomerAccountPaymentLabel.comment: The label for the applied customer account line in summary view

removeCustomerAccountPaymentLabel.comment: The label for the remove button on a customer account payment
